com.b2international.snowowl.datastore.cdo

Interface ICDORepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICDOManagedItem<ICDORepository>, org.eclipse.net4j.util.lifecycle.ILifecycle, org.eclipse.net4j.util.event.INotifier

    public interface ICDORepository
extends ICDOManagedItem<ICDORepository>
    Service interface for wrapping a CDO specific repository and a DB store.
